# maskAmountDidChange()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the cell when its mask amount changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func maskAmountDidChange()
```

## Discussion

## Managing Cell Mask

- **maskAmountWillChange(_:)**: Notifies the cell when its mask amount is about to change.
